item.title: stm8 cube
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: 3.2.2Installing STM8CubeMX from command lineThere INSTALL on macos nteractive modeTo perform interactive installation, type the following command:java –jar SetupSTM8CubeMX-1.0.0.exe –cons Figure 3. STM8Cube Installation WizardYou can then launch the installation just by typing the following command: java –jar SetupSTM8CubeMX-1.0.0.exe auto-install. Uninstalling STM8CubeMX on MacOSTo uninstall STM8CubeMX on MacOS, use the following command line: java -jar <STM8CubeMX installation path>/Uninstaller/uninstaller
